title: You Interface the World Through Your Religion
description:
What do you mean by the word "religion"? People think of "a religion" like Christianity or Judaism but religion is much deeper than that. The word has meant a lot of different things throughout history. Is religion a human authoring program? Is it a community creation device? Is it culture? Is it implicit?
